translation.en: [reporter] Tonight, all roads lead to Turbine Hall…
translation.zh: ‎今晚全城人都聚集在涡轮大厅
‎约翰内斯堡上流社会将见证

translation.en: the reveal of the first "Face of Bhengu Beauty,"
translation.zh:
‎约翰内斯堡上流社会将见证 ‎现场将揭晓
‎民众投选出来的本古美人新面孔

translation.en: voted for by the public online.
translation.zh:
‎现场将揭晓
‎民众投选出来的本古美人新面孔

translation.en: Mogul Don Bhengu is expected to make a speech about these new changes
translation.zh:
‎到时美妆巨头唐·本古
‎将针对公司的改革

translation.en: and the future of the Bhengu Beauty empire.
translation.zh:
‎以及本古美人化妆品王国
‎未来的趋向发表演说

translation.en: I don't care that the partners want equity.
This expansion is happening on Don Bhengu's terms.
translation.zh: ‎扩张公司是我唐·本古的决定

translation.en: I can talk to the Kenyans, Ngcolosi.
translation.zh: ‎我可以替你跟那群肯尼亚人谈谈

translation.en: The last time I went to Nairobi they were putty in my hands.
translation.zh:
‎上一次我到内罗毕时
‎他们都被我捏在手掌心里

translation.en: The new face of Bhengu must have mass appeal.
translation.zh:
‎本古美人的新面孔
‎将引起广泛的关注

translation.en: [in Sotho] They won’t need equity to make money…
[in English] Save that enthusiasm for telling the maid how to clean, Grace.
translation.zh:
‎格蕾丝 省下你的力气
‎去指导佣人怎么清理房子吧

translation.en: [in Sotho] I know you’re natural-born rubbish, Thando.
translation.zh: ‎谭朵 我看你天生就是垃圾

translation.en: [in English] Don't make it worse with your drinking.
translation.zh: ‎你的酗酒形象只会恶化公司形象

translation.en: You had to be carried out at the minister's party.
translation.zh:
‎你出席部长家的宴会
‎就不能克制点吗？

translation.en: [in Sotho] You disgraced our husband and the Bhengu name.
translation.zh: ‎你让我们丈夫和本古家丢尽颜面

translation.en: [in English] Please, Grace, I was fine. You're the one that--
translation.zh:
‎格蕾丝 当时我明明很清醒
‎是你小题大做

translation.en: Don't make excuses for being low-class.
You know, I can't believe they've got us here handing out goodie bags to guests.
translation.zh: ‎他们竟然叫我们去给客人派发礼包

translation.en: I should be the face of Bhengu Beauty.
translation.zh: ‎我更适合担任本古美人的新面孔吧

translation.en: [woman] I know, right. This Zinhle girl isn't even a real model.
translation.zh:
‎可不是吗？ 这个叫辛黛的女孩
‎不是什么专业模特儿

translation.en: And that's why you shouldn't allow the public to vote for the face of Bhengu.
translation.zh:
‎这就是为什么不应该公开票选
‎本古美人的新面孔

translation.en: Imagine being able to live with the Bhengu's.
translation.zh: ‎想象一下 能够住进本古家

translation.en: Getting your own car, getting to know Grace.
translation.zh: ‎有自己的轿车 可以跟格蕾丝做朋友
‎还可以跟彼拉·本古一起出席派对

translation.en: -Now you see that? -Oh my gosh. That's a different story.
translation.zh: ‎瞧瞧你 你想的可是另一回事了

translation.en: [woman 2] I'll tell him you say hi.
You guys just order whatever you want to, it's on me.
translation.zh: ‎你们想点什么尽管点 我请客

translation.en: Oh my God, you're doing my job again.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 你又跟我抢工作了

translation.en: It's just a little foundation, Sisi.
translation.zh: ‎大姐 我只是上了一层粉底
‎亲爱的 只能用我的粉底

translation.en: -But I like doing it. -That's okay, I'm fine with it.
translation.zh:
‎-可是我喜欢自己动手化妆
‎-不要紧的 我满意你的妆容

translation.en: [reporter] Past faces of Bhengu Beauty have been supermodels, actresses, and celebrities.
translation.zh:
‎往年本古美人的代言人
‎清一色都是超模、女演员和女明星
‎近来宣传照过分修图的行为

translation.en: Some wonder if the choice to go with an unknown face
translation.zh:
‎众人都想知道本古美人
‎这次选择让一个素人担任代言人

translation.en: signals real change at Bhengu Beauty
or is it simply lip service?
But as we can see tonight,
even though the public was asked to vote for the face of Bhengu Beauty,
translation.zh:
‎虽然本古美人的新任代言人
‎由民众票选出来

translation.en: the only guests here are an elite bunch.
translation.zh: ‎但受邀出席发布会者均为上流人士

translation.en: And now it seems Mr. Bhengu and his two wives have arrived.
translation.zh:
‎看来本古先生与其两位夫人
‎已经抵达现场

translation.en: [in Xhosa] I told you Angela's not welcome at Bhengu events.
translation.zh:
‎不是说好我不想看到
‎安吉拉出席本古美人的活动了吗？

translation.en: [in English] She's a very powerful journalist, what she says goes. This is big.
translation.zh:
‎她是个影响力很大的记者
‎说的话都很有分量 大活动少不了她

translation.en: So, Dad, what do you think?
[in Xhosa] Have some champagne and meet some nice girls.
translation.zh: ‎喝几杯香槟 去认识几个好女孩

translation.en: [in English] The walls could have been bigger.
translation.zh: ‎这些布景要是再大一点更好看

translation.en: Why do you insist on looking like a garden boy, Ndumiso?
translation.zh:
‎杜米索
‎你为什么老是打扮成小园丁的样子？

translation.en: [in Xhosa] We’re taking the family photo with or without Phila.
translation.zh:
‎不管彼拉来不来
‎我们先拍了全家福再说

‎-嗨 各位亲爱的家人
‎-你迟到了

translation.en: I made it with five minutes to spare.
[in Xhosa] Where’s your baby number one?
[in English] Mr. Bhengu, quick question, please.
translation.zh: ‎本古先生 介意回答一个问题吗？

translation.en: Why ask the public to vote for the face of Bhengu Beauty
translation.zh: ‎你们叫公众投选出本古美人的新面孔

translation.en: but not have them at this event?
translation.zh: ‎却不邀请他们来参加这项盛事

translation.en: You sure your company's committed to the things you speak about?
[in Xhosa] Reserve your questions until after the launch.
translation.zh: ‎等揭幕仪式过后再问也不迟

translation.en: [in English] And then you can be the judge.
[in Xhosa] She's always asking unnecessary questions.
[Thando in English] This is stunning, Linda.
translation.zh: ‎琳达 这场地布置得太好看了

translation.en: [Linda in Xhosa] No, don’t ask too many questions.
put your hands together for the CEO of Bhengu Beauty,
translation.zh: ‎请以掌声欢迎本古美人总裁

translation.en: If you told me 15 years ago that, uh…
Bhengu Beauty would become one of the biggest beauty companies in the country,
translation.zh:
‎本古美人将成为
‎全国规模最大的美妆品公司
‎乃至全非洲最大的美妆品公司

translation.en: I built this company with my own bare hands.
translation.zh: ‎这家公司是我白手经营起来的

translation.en: tonight we are here to unveil the new face of Bhengu Beauty.
translation.zh: ‎我们将揭晓本古美人的新面孔

translation.en: I left the choice to a public vote because
translation.zh: ‎我让公众投选出新任代言人

translation.en: I wanted to provide an opportunity to someone who reminds me of myself,
translation.zh:
‎是因为我想给
‎这个让我想起我来历的人一个机会

translation.en: before I became the Don Bhengu.
an underdog to represent us all.
translation.zh: ‎也不被看好 这个人将代表我们公司

translation.en: ushering in a new dawn as the newest face of Bhengu Beauty,
translation.zh:
‎这是新时代的开始
‎有请本古美人的新面孔

translation.en: Looks like Bhengu Beauty hasn't changed its colors after all.
translation.zh: ‎看来本古美人的“本色”依然没变

translation.en: I could get you something a little stronger if you like.
[Don in Xhosa] What nonsense is this?
Everyone’s going to call us hypocrites.
[in English] Ndu, take Zinhle to the car.
-How did this-- -Why must I repeat myself. Just do it.
translation.zh:
‎-到底怎么回事？
‎-还要我重复吗？快去啊

translation.en: [in Xhosa] Did you mess this up? You too busy partying?
translation.zh:
‎是不是你搞砸的？
‎最近都忙着搞派对吧？

translation.en: [Phila in English] I didn't do this!
I specifically told the designers to not change her complexion.
translation.zh:
‎我特地叮嘱过设计师
‎别修改她的面貌

translation.en: We're trying to show we're not stuck in the past
translation.zh: ‎我们努力让人知道我们想要改革

translation.en: I'll get to the bottom of this. Listen…
translation.zh: ‎我一定会差出真相 你听我说

translation.en: [in English] Get Peter to bring the car.
[Don in Xhosa] This is a disaster.
The driver could have brought me.
This is all going blow over
in like a day or two.
I don't know how anyone could be so negligent. You know?
It's okay. I can do it.
translation.zh: ‎不要紧的 我自己应付得来

translation.en: I bet this has never happened to Naomi Campbell.
translation.zh:
‎这种事绝不会
‎发生在娜奥米·坎贝尔身上吧

translation.en: Oh no, actually it has. I once helped her out just like this.
translation.zh:
‎其实发生过
‎我有一次帮她处理过这种事

translation.en: I'm joking. I've never met her. [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎逗你玩的 我没见过她本人

translation.en: Ah, yeah, well, Linda will figure out what happened,
translation.zh: ‎琳达会去查出究竟怎么回事

translation.en: and we will do what we do best.
[Thando] Actually, I'm going to my room.
No, you stay exactly where you are. I need everyone here.
translation.zh: ‎不行 你站住 大家都要在场

translation.en: You can see your favorite son is already doing it.
translation.zh: ‎你的宝贝儿子已经在调酒了

translation.en: [in English] As I said, we will handle it.
translation.zh: ‎我都说了 这事我们会处理好的

translation.en: My people are already tweeting in our favor.
translation.zh: ‎我的人已经在推特上帮我们说话了

translation.en: -[in Sotho] Any journalists called you? -No, Mam' Grace.
translation.zh:
‎-记者有没有联络你？
‎-没有 格蕾丝夫人
‎如果他们联络你 你就说无可奉告

translation.en: [in English] That goes for all of you.
and we're going to say it was a technical malfunction.
translation.zh: ‎到时我们会宣称是技术问题

translation.en: [in Sotho] Do you remember that I still need to go to my cousin's after-funeral cleansing?
translation.zh:
‎你还记得我跟你说过
‎我要出席我表姐的头七祭吗？

translation.en: [in English] Your cousin is not family, Zinhle.
translation.zh: ‎辛黛 你的表姐不是我们的家人

translation.en: The events company messed up the images. They can't explain what happened.
translation.zh: ‎是活动策划公司搞错了那些照片 ‎他们不知道是怎么搞错的

translation.en: -[Grace] Linda, that's not good enough. -I know that, Grace.
translation.zh: ‎琳达 这样可不行 ‎我知道 格蕾丝

translation.en: Okay, that's why I fired them.

translation.zh: ‎不用了 你做的已经够多了

translation.en: [in Sotho] What did I say to you

translation.zh: ‎我叫你别在公众面前绷着脸

translation.en: No thanks, and put that down. No more drinking for you.
translation.zh: ‎不了 谢谢 放下吧 你也别再喝了

translation.en: [in English] I should be getting you chocolates after the day you had.
translation.zh:
‎昨天你累坏了
‎我才应该给你泡一杯热巧克力

translation.en: [in English] It was weird seeing my face like that, as though it was bleached or something.
translation.zh: ‎看到我的脸好像漂白过 感觉怪怪的

translation.en: [in English] How much damage do you think this will do to Bhengu Beauty?
translation.zh:
‎你认为这件事会给本古美人
‎带来多大的损害？

translation.en: [in English] As you heard, PR statements are being made, woh, woh, woh, woh.
translation.zh:
‎你也听说了
‎公关部已经发出新闻稿了

translation.en: I wonder how long people will be talking about it.
What did I do to deserve these, really?
translation.zh:
‎我前生修了什么福？
‎竟能吃到这么好吃的东西？

translation.en: [in Zulu] I just wanted to thank you.
[in English] For being my friend here for the past four weeks.
translation.zh:
‎过去四个星期以来
‎感谢你当我的朋友

translation.en: [in Zulu] You'll get used to this place.
translation.zh: ‎住久了你就会渐渐习惯这里了

translation.en: [in English] Even the royal bitchness herself.
translation.zh: ‎到时你也会搞懂什么是“高级婊”

translation.en: But, it's good to have a new friend around here.
translation.zh:
‎你听我说
‎在这个家里有个朋友照应是好事

translation.en: [in Sotho] Where are you off to?
[in English] Partners are freaked out after last night.
translation.zh: ‎昨晚的事故惊动了我们的合作伙伴

translation.en: I need to make a few calls.
[in Sotho] I'll ask Regina to bring some coffee to the study.
translation.zh: ‎我会叫蕾吉娜把咖啡送到书房

translation.en: [in English] I'm actually going to the office.
[in Sotho] It's Saturday. I've arranged a relaxing spa treatment.
translation.zh:
‎今天是星期六
‎我已经给你安排好了按摩疗程

translation.en: [in English] I'll be back for dinner.
[in Zulu] Yesterday you seemed like you were a little sad.
[in English] You know what it's like with Grace.

translation.zh: ‎“笑一个 亲爱的 这是公众场合”

translation.en: What's it like being a second wife?

translation.zh: ‎我不鼓励女人当男人的小妾

translation.en: but what I do recommend is some wine with these chocolates.
translation.zh: ‎但我建议喝红酒搭配巧克力

translation.en: Hmm? Stolen from Grace's collection, of course.
translation.zh: ‎红酒必须是从格蕾丝那边偷来的

translation.en: [chuckles] It's not even midday yet. -[Thando] Really? -Mmm.
But it is the weekend, right?
Hi! I missed you so much.
Oh, babe, I heard about the launch.
translation.zh:
‎亲爱的
‎我听说你们产品推介会的事了

translation.en: Shh. I'm not here for that.
What do you mean? What's going on?
-Stop… -Oh my God, what's wrong? Are you okay?
translation.zh:
‎-停下
‎-天啊 怎么了？你没事吧？
‎亲爱的 怎么了？我马上叫救护车

translation.en: Grace doesn't want me to go.
I have to go, I'll call you back.
translation.zh: ‎我要挂电话了 晚点再给你打电话

translation.en: [in English] Does… Does Mam' Grace need me?
Would you like to grab something to eat?
I figured you could use an escape.
translation.zh: ‎我想你应该想出去透透气吧

translation.en: Ah. Thanks, but I'm going to sleep early.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你 可是我想早点睡

translation.en: Of course. Um… yeah, just shout if you need anything.
translation.zh: ‎好的 没事了 有什么需要尽管找我

translation.en: [in Sotho] We're here for Don Benghu. Where is he?
translation.zh: ‎我们是来看唐·本古的 ‎他在哪里？

translation.en: -[in English] Is he okay? -With you in a second. [Linda] Please, just tell us.
Hey! When I talk to you, you listen!
translation.zh: ‎喂 我跟你说话时 麻烦你听好

translation.en: -Where's my husband? -Mama, she's gonna get to us.
translation.zh:
‎-我的丈夫呢？
‎-妈妈 她会告诉我们的

translation.en: Is there a doctor or someone we can talk to?
translation.zh: ‎能不能找个医生跟我们说话？

translation.en: [in Sotho] What kind of service is this?
You're a private hospital and we're waiting in reception?
translation.zh:
‎这是私人医院
‎还要我们在接待处等吗？

translation.en: -[in English] Where's my husband? -[in Tswana] Sorry, ma'am. Come with me.
translation.zh: ‎我的丈夫呢？ ‎抱歉 夫人 请跟我来

translation.en: [in English] Just tell us if he's okay.
translation.zh: ‎你就直接说他到底有没有事
‎蕾吉娜姐 大家都上哪儿去了？

translation.en: [in Xhosa] They're all at the hospital. Bab' Don had a heart attack.
translation.zh: ‎他们都去了医院 ‎唐老爷心脏病发作

translation.en: -[in Tswana] He's in surgery right now. -[Linda in English] How long will it take?
translation.zh: ‎他目前正在做手术 ‎手术要多久？

translation.en: He has a history of coronary artery disease.
When can we talk to the doctor?
[in Tswana] I'll have more information after the surgery.
translation.zh: ‎手术过后 我们才有进一步消息

translation.en: Okay guys, whoa. It's just a little scare, okay.
This stays right here. We've had enough PR disasters already.
translation.zh:
‎这个消息绝不能传出去
‎我们要面对的公关危机已经够多了
‎妈妈 谁还在乎公关什么的？

translation.en: Dad just has a heart attack.
[in Sotho] We can't have people speculating.
translation.zh: ‎我们不能让外界有舆论的余地

translation.en: Phila, find out who he was with at the office when this happened.
translation.zh:
‎彼拉 你去查一下
‎你爸出事时办公室还有什么人

translation.en: -[in English] What? -[Grace] It's all your fault.
[in English] Are you fucking kidding, Grace Mama, come on, that's unfair.
translation.zh:
‎-开什么玩笑 格蕾丝？
‎-妈妈 够了 你这么说不妥吧
‎琳达 我妈妈不是故意的

translation.en: [Grace in Sotho] What are you doing here?
Sis' Regina told me what had happened.
[in English] I thought I'd bring some snacks.
It's like you read my mind. I'm famished.
translation.zh: ‎你真是我的知音 我快饿死了

translation.en: His driver insisted he was there.
translation.zh: ‎你爸爸的司机坚称他去了办公室

translation.en: [Phila] They found him at the company penthouse.
translation.zh:
‎爸爸是在公司大楼的顶层公寓
‎被发现的

translation.en: Hey, this looks good. Is this you?
translation.zh: ‎看起来很好吃的样子 是你做的吗？

translation.en: -It's the least I could do. -Thank you.
And don't you dare tell anyone about this.
Let me know if you need anything else.
translation.zh: ‎有什么需要 尽管跟我说一声

translation.en: Oh yeah, um… let me walk you out.
Stay with everyone. I'll be okay.
translation.zh:
‎你留下来陪家人吧
‎我可以自己走出去

translation.en: [in English] I don't have any family.
[in English] Ndu and Phila, they have Grace, and…
translation.zh: ‎杜米索和彼拉有格蕾丝 然后…

translation.en: [Thando] No matter what, Grace cannot get rid of you.
translation.zh:
‎无论发生什么事
‎格蕾丝都不能把你赶走的

translation.en: Well, it wouldn't be the worst thing, right?
translation.zh:
‎对我来说 那也不算最糟糕的事
‎不是吗？

translation.en: [in Zulu] Your father is going to make it through.
Bhengu boys, your father's going to need a lot of support at the office.
translation.zh:
‎本古家的两位少爷
‎你们爸爸的办公室需要你们出力

translation.en: [in Xhosa] Ma, can we stop talking about business for a second?
translation.zh: ‎妈妈 能不能暂时不谈公事？ ‎搞什么？爸爸可能过不了这一关

translation.en: [in English] How are you? We could lose Dad.
translation.zh: ‎搞什么？爸爸可能过不了这一关

translation.en: Okay, hold on. We're not going to lose him.
translation.zh: ‎先别这么说 爸爸不会死的

translation.en: But he is right. Maybe we can cool it on the business talk.
translation.zh: ‎但他说得对 ‎也许我们暂时先别谈公事

translation.en: Your father's going to need a successor sooner than later.
translation.zh: ‎你们的爸爸迟早需要一个继承人

translation.en: [in Sotho] Think Linda's just "chilling" right now?
translation.zh: ‎你们以为琳达现在会闲着吗？

translation.en: [in English] If that happens, then he's going to choose me.
translation.zh:
‎如果真要选个继承人
‎那个人绝对是我

translation.en: Someone leaked the news of Dad all over social media.
translation.zh:
‎有人把爸爸出事的消息泄漏出去了
‎社媒都刷屏了

translation.en: What did I say to all of you?
[in Sotho] I said do not speak to the press!
[in English] Who said something, guys? Who?
-Did you say-- -She's always around, so it makes sense.
translation.zh:
‎她一直跟我们待在一起
‎是她也不奇怪

translation.en: Maybe someone heard us at reception.
translation.zh: ‎也可能在接待处被人听到了

translation.en: Look, I will talk to the board, okay.
And we'll make sure that we…
[in Tswana] Yes, you can. But he's still resting.
translation.zh:
‎-可以去看他了吗？
‎-可以了 ‎但他在休息

translation.en: [in English] To help with recovery. So bear that in mind.
translation.zh: ‎休息有助于康复 你们都记住了

translation.en: [in Sotho] Don't you ever scare us like that again.
[Linda in Xhosa] Dad, please hold on.
Well, I know that you're gonna be out of here in a couple of days. So…
translation.zh:
‎看来接下来几天内
‎你都要躺在医院里

translation.en: Excuse me, hi, did I not leave my phone here?
translation.zh:
‎不好意思
‎我是不是把手机落在这里了？

translation.en: [sighs] And this is my cue to go to bed.

translation.zh: ‎各位 晚安 感谢大家

translation.en: If it isn't a curse, what is it?
translation.zh: ‎如果不是个诅咒 你们说是什么？

translation.en: First the launch… [in Xhosa] …and now Dad. This is a curse.
translation.zh:
‎先是新产品推介会出事
‎再来轮到爸爸出事 这分明是个诅咒

translation.en: -[in English] It's not a curse. -Uh-huh. Thank you.

translation.zh:
‎-各位 我们一直在浪费时间
‎-杜米索

translation.en: [in Sotho] It's not time for one of your sermons. Go to bed.
translation.zh: ‎现在不是你证道的时候 去睡吧

translation.en: [in English] That's not for you to worry about.
[Ndu in English] She's just trying to be nice, Mom.
[in Sotho] Did you tell anyone about Don's heart attack?
translation.zh: ‎是你告诉别人说我丈夫出事的吗？

translation.en: No, Mam' Grace. My phone's been off the whole night.
translation.zh:
‎不是的 格蕾丝夫人
‎我的手机整晚都没开过

translation.en: [in Sotho] They wish their cards read "Rest in Peace."
translation.zh:
‎他们真希望能在慰问卡上
‎写下“愿逝者安息”几个大字

translation.en: You'd swear I'm the one who had a heart attack.
translation.zh: ‎真希望心脏病发作的人是我 ‎（爱你的科洛比）

translation.en: Justice… were you on duty when my husband had a heart attack?
translation.zh:
‎贾斯迪斯 ‎我丈夫心脏病发作时
‎是你在执勤吗？

translation.en: I thought I'd have to drag you back home. Hmm?
translation.zh: ‎我还以为我要把你拖回来才行呢

translation.en: [in Sotho] Let's go inside. Makhosi Mnisi is waiting.
translation.zh: ‎我们进屋去吧 敏西法师在等你了

translation.en: [in Sotho] We have to stay strong for her.
I still need to see other people. You're wasting my time.
translation.zh:
‎我还有其他人要见呢
‎你们简直在浪费我的时间

translation.en: [Zinhle] I'm sorry. But I have a bottle of whiskey for you.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 我给你带了一瓶威士忌

translation.en: I've been up for a while now.
[in English] I'm so fit, I could run a marathon.
translation.zh: ‎好多了 可以跑马拉松了

translation.en: [in Xhosa] I've brought someone to see you.
[in Xhosa] I'm glad to see you awake.
I brought a few traditional things.
[in Zulu] These Western doctors also need help.
translation.zh: ‎这些西医也需要搭把手 对吧？

translation.en: [Makhosi in Zulu] Ancestors of the Selepe family,
the Elders and Protectors of this family,
translation.zh: ‎你们是这个家的先祖和守护者

translation.en: I ask that you allow me as a healer
To cleanse them because there isn't an elder to do so.
translation.zh: ‎洁净他们 毕竟他们不是长者

translation.en: Please allow me to remove this dark cloud that follows them.
translation.zh: ‎请允许我消除尾随着他们的乌烟瘴气

translation.en: And to remove these dark spirits that follow them.
Spirits that took their sister, Amahle.
translation.zh: ‎恶灵带走了他们的姐姐阿玛赫

translation.en: Please allow me to do this so that their paths can be cleared.
translation.zh: ‎请允许我洁净他们 为他们开路

translation.en: I can feel it working already.
translation.zh: ‎我已经可以感觉到它的效用了

translation.en: [in Sotho] I didn't know you called for Simphiwe
[in Sotho] Linda, you know your father's treatments can't…
translation.zh:
‎琳达 你也知道
‎你父亲接受的治疗不能…

translation.en: [in English] I know what's good for me, Grace.
translation.zh: ‎格蕾丝 我知道什么东西对我有帮助

translation.en: [in Xhosa] Thank you, my child. You can go.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你 乖女儿 ‎你可以走了

translation.en: [in English] We should be more careful. [Don] Sit down.
There's going to be a few changes in our lives.
translation.zh: ‎我们的生活将出现一些改变

translation.en: [Grace in Sotho] You know I can't have more kids.
[in English] Another heart attack and I'm dead.
translation.zh: ‎心脏病再发作 我就没命了

translation.en: I don't have time to waste, so I'm taking another wife.
translation.zh: ‎我没时间了 所以我决定再纳妾

translation.en: I've already found someone who'll give me children.
translation.zh: ‎我已经找到能够为我生育的女人了

translation.en: You can't make a decision like that without my permission!
translation.zh:
‎没有我的同意
‎你不能擅自做这种决定

translation.en: No, I don't need your permission.
[in Sotho] I allowed my husband to marry you
so he could have his entertainment at home.
Why is he looking elsewhere when you're here?
translation.zh:
‎你都嫁进来了
‎他为什么还要找新的？

translation.en: Do you want to go and ask him yourself?
translation.zh: ‎不如你亲自去问问你丈夫吧？

translation.en: [in Zulu] You heard what he said.
He wants more children, and you and I both know I couldn't…
translation.zh:
‎他要更多孩子
‎我们都知道我们的肚皮不争气

translation.en: [in English] Shut up! Thando, just shut up!
translation.zh: ‎闭嘴 谭朵 你少说两句！
‎亲爱的 笑一个 这是公共场合

translation.en: [Grace in English] You know exactly who I am.
[in Sotho] Isn't that a whore's name?
translation.zh: ‎一听就知道是妓女的艺名 不是吗？

translation.en: [in Zulu] No, it's my real name.
You want to do this sleeping or awake?
I'm not the bad guy here.
translation.zh: ‎这件事上 我可不是坏人

translation.en: You're the one sleeping with my husband.
translation.zh: ‎你才是那个睡我丈夫的小三

translation.en: We can do this painlessly if you want.
translation.zh: ‎你愿意的话 整个过程不痛不痒

translation.en: Now go with the lovely nurse.
For helping me win the online competition and the pictures at the launch.
translation.zh:
‎这是感谢他帮我赢得网络票选冠军
‎和修改推介会照片的酬劳
‎现在这屋里就你一个人住了

translation.en: I don't have to see Grace and Don every day.
translation.zh: ‎起码我不用天天见到格蕾丝和唐老爷

translation.en: I managed to get into Don's room at the hospital.
translation.zh: ‎那天我潜进了唐老爷的病房

translation.en: He looked nothing like the scary man from our childhood.
translation.zh:
‎完全不像
‎那个给我们留下童年阴影的男人

translation.en: I wanted to finish him off.
so that he sees us destroy everything that he loves.
translation.zh:
‎让他亲眼看见
‎我们怎么毁掉他所爱的一切

translation.en: I know it's only been six months since we lost Amahle.
translation.zh: ‎我知道阿玛赫离开刚满六个月

translation.en: I don't need time. This has to be done.
translation.zh:
‎我不需要时间
‎我一定要摧毁他的人生

translation.en: Did you get what I asked for?
I did, but you don't need it.
translation.zh: ‎弄到了 可是你不需要那种玩意

translation.en: [in English] Just in case things go wrong.
[in English] For doing this with me.
[in Zulu] He say he'll marry you?
If you marry him, you're going to be wife number three.
translation.zh: ‎如果你嫁给他 你就是三姨太

translation.en: [in Zulu] He'll get you pregnant as soon as he can.
[in English] That doesn't mean he'll stop sleeping with other girls.
translation.zh:
‎但那并不意味着
‎他不再跟别的女人上床

translation.en: [in Zulu] There are lots of Rubys.
translation.zh: ‎外面还有很多像你这种女人

translation.en: [in English] You'll feel trapped. You know why?
translation.zh:
‎就会觉得自己像个囚犯
‎知道为什么吗？

translation.en: [in Zulu] Because the Bhengu name will not be tainted by divorce.
translation.zh:
‎因为本古家的名誉
‎绝不容被离婚这种事玷污

translation.en: if you don't want to suffer for the rest of your life,
translation.zh: ‎如果你希望自己下半辈子不吃苦

translation.en: you'll say and do exactly what I tell you.
[in English] Is Mam' Grace around? I wanted to tell her that I'm back.
translation.zh:
‎格蕾丝夫人在家吗？
‎我想跟她说我回来了

translation.en: [in English] Join me for dinner. Otherwise, all that food will go to waste,
translation.zh: ‎一起吃晚餐吧 ‎不然食物都被浪费了

translation.en: and Regina was expecting everyone to be here.
translation.zh: ‎蕾吉娜以为大家都会回来吃饭

translation.en: Um, so, how was the cleansing?
As good as these things get.
-Do you mind me asking why-- -How's your Dad?
translation.zh:
‎-介意我问你为什么…
‎-你爸爸情况如何？

translation.en: [Ndu] Oh, I did, in art school.
translation.zh: ‎我以前就读艺术学院时拍的

translation.en: Yeah. I'm actually looking for something that I can print out and frame
translation.zh: ‎是啊 其实我想选一张出来打印裱好

translation.en: for Dad as a welcome-home gift.
[Ndu in English] Yeah. Um, that's from two years ago.
When I used to copy everything Phila used to do,
They had to cut me out. It took two months to recover.
translation.zh:
‎医生在我的腿上开了一个大洞
‎两个月后才康复

translation.en: I could have died without living a meaningful life.
Now I spend my time looking for the deeper meaning in life, you know.
translation.zh:
‎如今我都在不断地寻找
‎人生更深层的意义

translation.en: Sorry, I'm actually not that hungry.
I'm leaving, Don. I can't do this anymore.
translation.zh: ‎唐老爷 我要走了 我受不了了

translation.en: You're old enough to be my father,
translation.zh: ‎你的年纪已经足以当我爸爸了

translation.en: and I deserve way more than an arrangement.
I want to marry you, start a family.
translation.zh: ‎我想娶你过门 跟你一起组织家庭

translation.en: I'm sorry I have to go,
[in Sotho] Cut them into smaller pieces.
We don't want him to choke after surviving a heart attack.
translation.zh: ‎我们可不希望他逃过死劫后被噎着

translation.en: [in English] Speaking of, are we picking him up?
translation.zh: ‎说到爸爸 我们要去接他回来吗？

translation.en: [in Sotho] No, he said his driver will bring him back.
translation.zh: ‎不用 他说司机会送他回来

translation.en: [in Sotho] Thank you for letting me go to the cleansing yesterday.
translation.zh: ‎感谢你允许出席表姐的头七祭

translation.en: I like the outfit too. Turn around so I can see.
translation.zh:
‎我也很喜欢你的服饰打扮
‎转过身去让我看看

translation.en: Take a selfie and send it to Sonto in social media.
translation.zh: ‎去自拍一张 发给社媒管理人桑托

translation.en: [in English] And touch up your make-up. You're sweating.
translation.zh: ‎顺便去补个妆 你流汗了

translation.en: [in Sotho] You know, in my day…
you had to be taller and lighter…
[Phila in English] You can't just say things like that.
translation.zh: ‎妈妈 你怎么说这种话呢？

translation.en: [in Sotho] When she won the competition, I was this close to denying the results.
translation.zh:
‎她成为比赛赢家的那一刻
‎我差点就拒绝用她了

translation.en: [Phila in English] Yeah, she's not your typical model,
translation.zh: ‎她确实不是你喜欢的模特儿类型

translation.en: but she is beautiful and she is likable.
translation.zh: ‎但她胜在长得好看 也受欢迎

translation.en: [in Sotho] Give me the knife. Let me show you.
[in English] You can let go, Nana.
